OTTAY
Skycruiser
ervice
*
COLONIA
BLINE S
ROUTE OF THE SKYCRUISERS

PLACE THIS ON YOUR SEAT
IF YOU WISH TO RETAIN IT
COLONIAL AIRLINES

I'M HOLDING THIS SEAT
FOR A PASSENGER WHO
WAS HERE FIRST

The Inhaler will not only relieve nasal congestion
but will also help prevent ear discomfort, which may occur

*T.M. Reg. U.S. Pat. Off.

Lace ya have handful bosfer or line math aligar
flight attendant for a complimentary sample-size Benzedrex* Inhaler.
The Inhaler will not only relieve nasal congestion

*T.M. Reg. U.S. Pat. Off.
AL:BX1

EFFECTIVE SEPTEMBER 25, 1949
COLONIAL
Route of the Shycruisers
AIRLINES
CANADA
BERMUDA
BILLFOLD EDITION

The Stewardess on overy Colonial airliner
Is in attendance with only one objective
In mind: To make your trip as comfortable
and as pleasant as possible.
Just prose
the button above your window, and she
will be Instantly at your service.
Il she can holp you with any of the fol
lowing facilities, ploase don't hesitate to
call her.
* ADJUSTING YOUR CHAIR
At the touch of a lever your lounge chair
can be adjusted to any one of three posi-
tions. If you feel like a nap, perhaps you
will prefer to have it reclining, and
mako use of a pillow or a lap robe.
* SEAT BELT
In accordance with Government require
ments, your seat belt must be fastened
during takeoff and landing.
The lighted
sign above the pilot's compartment will
remind you.
* MAGAZINES AND STATIONERY
The stewardess will bo glad tos upily you
with stationery, or my of the
magazines: Life, Esquire, Reader's Digest,
Time, Colliers, Motion Picture, Saturday
Evening Post, New Yorker, American Trav-
eler and Official Aviation Guide.
There
is a reading light above your window.
* LAVATORY
The lavatory in the rear of the cabin is
equipped with soap, towels, Kleenex, etc.
It also contains a sterilized Schick Dual
electric razor, or if you prefer, a compli-
mentary Enders Razor and blade.
* COAT HANGERS
To keop your coat from getting mussod,
hangers are provided in the rear of the
plane. Just call the stewardess and she
will take care of it.
We are permitted to
carry hats cly in the rack abovo your
* CIGARETTE SMOKING
PERMITTED
Except during landing and takeoff. Pipes
will be allowed provided they are
objectionable to other passengers.
* HEATING AND VENTILATING
THE CABIN
Passenger cabins are heated to comfort.
able temperatures in winter, cd air-cool-
ed in summer. The entire air content is
changed once every minute, but if you
destre more fresh air, you need only adjust
the ventilator over your window.
* MISCELLANEOUS SUPPLIES
Chewing gum, aspirin, Alka-Seltzer, diges-
tive tablets and other supplies are obtain.
able from the stewardess.
In case of head cold or sinus trouble, ask
your Stewardess for a complimentary
Benzedrine Inhaler.
Complimentary cig-
arettes are available.

PLACE THIS ON YOUR SEAT
IF YOU WISH TO RETAIN IT
COLONIAL AIRLINES
GRrrr-

I'M HOLDING THIS SEAT
FOR A PASSENGER WHO
WAS HERE FIRST
